creator: Rogervoice
descriptionHtml:
Rogervoice subtitles phone calls. Call anyone, and get a real-time transcription of the conversation. Meet the fastest, most reliable and versatile call captioning app on the market. And it’s free.

Do you know someone having difficulty with phone calls because of their hearing?
Make their day better and share this app with them.

Rogervoice uses automatic speech recognition and speech synthesis.
Call anyone, anytime. Rogervoice is available 24/7!
Breaking barriers worldwide : Rogervoice works in over 100 languages, in any country.

How does Rogervoice work?

1. Dial any number. Call your friends, your coworkers, your doctor, or any number, local or international.
2. Read your calls in real time. During a call, simply hold your smartphone in front of you to read the transcribed text.
3. Reply by talking using your voice, or reply by typing. When you type, your contact will hear your message.

Dial all numbers except short codes or emergency numbers (like 112 or 911).
A separate mobile carrier plan and phone number is required.
For calls, a broadband connection is required either using mobile (3G, 4G) or Wi-Fi network.

Who is Rogervoice for?

• For persons who are deaf or hard of hearing, making a call has never been simpler! No more waiting on others. No more anxiety of missed calls and missed opportunities.

• For persons with difficulty speaking or aphasia, Rogervoice makes it possible to call and type your response in real time.

• For business persons, Rogervoice saves the transcription on your phone, making it easy to record call transcriptions and automatic notes.

Rogervoice is a fully featured phone app. We do the heavy work, so you don’t have to.

• Outgoing calls to any phone number
• Incoming calls from any number
• Free calls between two app users
• Transcription of calls in real time
• Transcription of voice messages
• Text-to-speech of typed messages during a call
• Call log and transcription history
• Saved preferences
• Contact syncing
• Caller ID
• Supports Interactive dial-tone navigation

Is Rogervoice free? Yes.

• Free
Rogervoice is free to download and register.
Making calls between Rogervoice users is free.
No advertisements or selling of personal data.
No complicated registration system required.

• Paid subscriptions
Making calls with non-Rogervoice users requires a subscription. This covers the cost of a Rogervoice number to receive calls, and the cost of calls.
Subscribe to Rogervoice plans to receive and make calls to people who don’t have the app. See our pricing plans on our website or in the app.

Cancel your subscription anytime. The renewal of your Rogervoice subscription is automatic. You can cancel your automatic renewal anytime, at least 24 hours before the end of the current subscription period.

More info:
Website: https://rogervoice.com/
Help: http://help.rogervoice.com/
Blog: https://medium.com/rogervoice
Twitter : [https://twitter.com/rogervoice](https://twitter.com/rogervoice)
Facebook : [https://www.facebook.com/rogervoiceapp/](https://www.facebook.com/rogervoiceapp/)
Instagram : [https://www.instagram.com/rogervoiceapp/]https://www.instagram.com/rogervoiceapp/)
descriptionShort: Read your calls: Real-time subtitled phone conversations

Make their day better and share this app with them.

Rogervoice uses automatic speech recognition and speech synthesis.
Call anyone, anytime. Rogervoice is available 24/7!
Breaking barriers worldwide : Rogervoice works in over 100 languages, in any country.

How does Rogervoice work?

1. Dial any number. Call your friends, your coworkers, your doctor, or any number, local or international.
2. Read your calls in real time. During a call, simply hold your smartphone in front of you to read the transcribed text.
3. Reply by talking using your voice, or reply by typing. When you type, your contact will hear your message.

Dial all numbers except short codes or emergency numbers (like 112 or 911).
A separate mobile carrier plan and phone number is required.
For calls, a broadband connection is required either using mobile (3G, 4G) or Wi-Fi network.

Who is Rogervoice for?

• For persons who are deaf or hard of hearing, making a call has never been simpler! No more waiting on others. No more anxiety of missed calls and missed opportunities.

• For persons with difficulty speaking or aphasia, Rogervoice makes it possible to call and type your response in real time.

• For business persons, Rogervoice saves the transcription on your phone, making it easy to record call transcriptions and automatic notes.

Rogervoice is a fully featured phone app. We do the heavy work, so you don’t have to.

• Outgoing calls to any phone number
• Incoming calls from any number
• Free calls between two app users
• Transcription of calls in real time
• Transcription of voice messages
• Text-to-speech of typed messages during a call
• Call log and transcription history
• Saved preferences
• Contact syncing
• Caller ID
• Supports Interactive dial-tone navigation

Is Rogervoice free? Yes.

• Free
Rogervoice is free to download and register.
Making calls between Rogervoice users is free.
No advertisements or selling of personal data.
No complicated registration system required.

• Paid subscriptions
Making calls with non-Rogervoice users requires a subscription. This covers the cost of a Rogervoice number to receive calls, and the cost of calls.
Subscribe to Rogervoice plans to receive and make calls to people who don’t have the app. See our pricing plans on our website or in the app.

Cancel your subscription anytime. The renewal of your Rogervoice subscription is automatic. You can cancel your automatic renewal anytime, at least 24 hours before the end of the current subscription period.

Rogervoice uses automatic speech recognition and speech synthesis.
Call anyone, anytime. Rogervoice is available 24/7!
Breaking barriers worldwide : Rogervoice works in over 100 languages, in any country.

How does Rogervoice work?

1. Dial any number. Call your friends, your coworkers, your doctor, or any number, local or international.
2. Read your calls in real time. During a call, simply hold your smartphone in front of you to read the transcribed text.
3. Reply by talking using your voice, or reply by typing. When you type, your contact will hear your message.

Dial all numbers except short codes or emergency numbers (like 112 or 911).
A separate mobile carrier plan and phone number is required.
For calls, a broadband connection is required either using mobile (3G, 4G) or Wi-Fi network.

Who is Rogervoice for?

• For persons who are deaf or hard of hearing, making a call has never been simpler! No more waiting on others. No more anxiety of missed calls and missed opportunities.

• For persons with difficulty speaking or aphasia, Rogervoice makes it possible to call and type your response in real time.

• For business persons, Rogervoice saves the transcription on your phone, making it easy to record call transcriptions and automatic notes.

Rogervoice is a fully featured phone app. We do the heavy work, so you don’t have to.

• Outgoing calls to any phone number
• Incoming calls from any number
• Free calls between two app users
• Transcription of calls in real time
• Transcription of voice messages
• Text-to-speech of typed messages during a call
• Call log and transcription history
• Saved preferences
• Contact syncing
• Caller ID
• Supports Interactive dial-tone navigation

Is Rogervoice free? Yes.

• Free
Rogervoice is free to download and register.
Making calls between Rogervoice users is free.
No advertisements or selling of personal data.
No complicated registration system required.

• Paid subscriptions
Making calls with non-Rogervoice users requires a subscription. This covers the cost of a Rogervoice number to receive calls, and the cost of calls.
Subscribe to Rogervoice plans to receive and make calls to people who don’t have the app. See our pricing plans on our website or in the app.

Cancel your subscription anytime. The renewal of your Rogervoice subscription is automatic. You can cancel your automatic renewal anytime, at least 24 hours before the end of the current subscription period.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
It's now possible to save your conversations for later and reread them 💬 (available with your subscription plan). It is your responsibility to inform your contact that the transcriptions are stored on your device for later reading.
Privacy by design is inherent to Rogervoice's philosophy 🔒 Transcriptions are stored on your device only ; Rogervoice does not store any transcription content. See our updated Privacy Policy in this regard.

This update brings technical improvements and bug fixes.

title: Rogervoice

creator: Rogervoice
descriptionHtml:
Rogervoice subtitles phone calls. Call anyone, and get a real-time transcription of the conversation. Meet the fastest, most reliable and versatile call captioning app on the market. And it’s free.

Do you know someone having difficulty with phone calls because of their hearing?
Make their day better and share this app with them.

Rogervoice uses automatic speech recognition and speech synthesis.
Call anyone, anytime. Rogervoice is available 24/7!
Breaking barriers worldwide : Rogervoice works in over 100 languages, in any country.

How does Rogervoice work?

1. Dial any number. Call your friends, your coworkers, your doctor, or any number, local or international.
2. Read your calls in real time. During a call, simply hold your smartphone in front of you to read the transcribed text.
3. Reply by talking using your voice, or reply by typing. When you type, your contact will hear your message.

Dial all numbers except short codes or emergency numbers (like 112 or 911).
A separate mobile carrier plan and phone number is required.
For calls, a broadband connection is required either using mobile (3G, 4G) or Wi-Fi network.

Who is Rogervoice for?

• For persons who are deaf or hard of hearing, making a call has never been simpler! No more waiting on others. No more anxiety of missed calls and missed opportunities.

• For persons with difficulty speaking or aphasia, Rogervoice makes it possible to call and type your response in real time.

• For business persons, Rogervoice saves the transcription on your phone, making it easy to record call transcriptions and automatic notes.

Rogervoice is a fully featured phone app. We do the heavy work, so you don’t have to.

• Outgoing calls to any phone number
• Incoming calls from any number
• Free calls between two app users
• Transcription of calls in real time
• Transcription of voice messages
• Text-to-speech of typed messages during a call
• Call log and transcription history
• Saved preferences
• Contact syncing
• Caller ID
• Supports Interactive dial-tone navigation

Is Rogervoice free? Yes.

• Free
Rogervoice is free to download and register.
Making calls between Rogervoice users is free.
No advertisements or selling of personal data.
No complicated registration system required.

• Paid subscriptions
Making calls with non-Rogervoice users requires a subscription. This covers the cost of a Rogervoice number to receive calls, and the cost of calls.
Subscribe to Rogervoice plans to receive and make calls to people who don’t have the app. See our pricing plans on our website or in the app.

Cancel your subscription anytime. The renewal of your Rogervoice subscription is automatic. You can cancel your automatic renewal anytime, at least 24 hours before the end of the current subscription period.

More info:
Website: https://rogervoice.com/
Help: http://help.rogervoice.com/
Blog: https://medium.com/rogervoice
Twitter : [https://twitter.com/rogervoice](https://twitter.com/rogervoice)
Facebook : [https://www.facebook.com/rogervoiceapp/](https://www.facebook.com/rogervoiceapp/)
Instagram : [https://www.instagram.com/rogervoiceapp/]https://www.instagram.com/rogervoiceapp/)
descriptionShort: Read your calls: Real-time subtitled phone conversations

Rogervoice subtitles phone calls. Call anyone, and get a real-time transcription of the conversation. Meet the fastest, most reliable and versatile call captioning app on the market. And it’s free.

Do you know someone having difficulty with phone calls because of their hearing?
Make their day better and share this app with them.

Rogervoice uses automatic speech recognition and speech synthesis.
Call anyone, anytime. Rogervoice is available 24/7!
Breaking barriers worldwide : Rogervoice works in over 100 languages, in any country.

How does Rogervoice work?

1. Dial any number. Call your friends, your coworkers, your doctor, or any number, local or international.
2. Read your calls in real time. During a call, simply hold your smartphone in front of you to read the transcribed text.
3. Reply by talking using your voice, or reply by typing. When you type, your contact will hear your message.

Dial all numbers except short codes or emergency numbers (like 112 or 911).
A separate mobile carrier plan and phone number is required.
For calls, a broadband connection is required either using mobile (3G, 4G) or Wi-Fi network.

Who is Rogervoice for?

• For persons who are deaf or hard of hearing, making a call has never been simpler! No more waiting on others. No more anxiety of missed calls and missed opportunities.

• For persons with difficulty speaking or aphasia, Rogervoice makes it possible to call and type your response in real time.

• For business persons, Rogervoice saves the transcription on your phone, making it easy to record call transcriptions and automatic notes.

Rogervoice is a fully featured phone app. We do the heavy work, so you don’t have to.

• Outgoing calls to any phone number
• Incoming calls from any number
• Free calls between two app users
• Transcription of calls in real time
• Transcription of voice messages
• Text-to-speech of typed messages during a call
• Call log and transcription history
• Saved preferences
• Contact syncing
• Caller ID
• Supports Interactive dial-tone navigation

Is Rogervoice free? Yes.

• Free
Rogervoice is free to download and register.
Making calls between Rogervoice users is free.
No advertisements or selling of personal data.
No complicated registration system required.

• Paid subscriptions
Making calls with non-Rogervoice users requires a subscription. This covers the cost of a Rogervoice number to receive calls, and the cost of calls.
Subscribe to Rogervoice plans to receive and make calls to people who don’t have the app. See our pricing plans on our website or in the app.

Cancel your subscription anytime. The renewal of your Rogervoice subscription is automatic. You can cancel your automatic renewal anytime, at least 24 hours before the end of the current subscription period.

More info:
Website: https://rogervoice.com/
Help: http://help.rogervoice.com/
Blog: https://medium.com/rogervoice
Twitter : [https://twitter.com/rogervoice](https://twitter.com/rogervoice)
Facebook : [https://www.facebook.com/rogervoiceapp/](https://www.facebook.com/rogervoiceapp/)
Instagram : [https://www.instagram.com/rogervoiceapp/]https://www.instagram.com/rogervoiceapp/)
descriptionShort: Read your calls: Real-time subtitled phone conversations

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
You waited for it, here it comes: the captioned voicemail! If you miss a call, your correspondent can leave you a voice message. It will be automatically transcribed and you can read it when you are available.

As always, this update includes general technical improvements and bug fixes, making Rogervoice always more reliable and faster than ever.

You waited for it, here it comes: the captioned voicemail! If you miss a call, your correspondent can leave you a voice message. It will be automatically transcribed and you can read it when you are available.

As always, this update includes general technical improvements and bug fixes, making Rogervoice always more reliable and faster than ever.

title: Rogervoice

creator: Rogervoice
descriptionHtml:
Rogervoice subtitles phone calls. Call anyone, and get a real-time transcription of the conversation. Meet the fastest, most reliable and versatile call captioning app on the market. And it’s free.

Do you know someone having difficulty with phone calls because of their hearing?
Make their day better and share this app with them.

Rogervoice uses automatic speech recognition and speech synthesis.
Call anyone, anytime. Rogervoice is available 24/7!
Breaking barriers worldwide : Rogervoice works in over 100 languages, in any country.

How does Rogervoice work?

1. Dial any number. Call your friends, your coworkers, your doctor, or any number, local or international.
2. Read your calls in real time. During a call, simply hold your smartphone in front of you to read the transcribed text.
3. Reply by talking using your voice, or reply by typing. When you type, your contact will hear your message.

Dial all numbers except short codes or emergency numbers (like 112 or 911).
A separate mobile carrier plan and phone number is required.
For calls, a broadband connection is required either using mobile (3G, 4G) or Wi-Fi network.

Who is Rogervoice for?

• For persons who are deaf or hard of hearing, making a call has never been simpler! No more waiting on others. No more anxiety of missed calls and missed opportunities.

• For persons with difficulty speaking or aphasia, Rogervoice makes it possible to call and type your response in real time.

• For business persons, Rogervoice saves the transcription on your phone, making it easy to record call transcriptions and automatic notes.

Rogervoice is a fully featured phone app. We do the heavy work, so you don’t have to.

• Outgoing calls to any phone number
• Incoming calls from any number
• Free calls between two app users
• Transcription of calls in real time
• Transcription of voice messages
• Text-to-speech of typed messages during a call
• Call log and transcription history
• Saved preferences
• Contact syncing
• Caller ID
• Supports Interactive dial-tone navigation

Is Rogervoice free? Yes.

• Free
Rogervoice is free to download and register.
Making calls between Rogervoice users is free.
No advertisements or selling of personal data.
No complicated registration system required.

• Paid subscriptions
Making calls with non-Rogervoice users requires a subscription. This covers the cost of a Rogervoice number to receive calls, and the cost of calls.
Subscribe to Rogervoice plans to receive and make calls to people who don’t have the app. See our pricing plans on our website or in the app.

Cancel your subscription anytime. The renewal of your Rogervoice subscription is automatic. You can cancel your automatic renewal anytime, at least 24 hours before the end of the current subscription period.

More info:
Website: https://rogervoice.com/
Help: http://help.rogervoice.com/
Blog: https://medium.com/rogervoice
Twitter : [https://twitter.com/rogervoice](https://twitter.com/rogervoice)
Facebook : [https://www.facebook.com/rogervoiceapp/](https://www.facebook.com/rogervoiceapp/)
Instagram : [https://www.instagram.com/rogervoiceapp/]https://www.instagram.com/rogervoiceapp/)

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Thank you for calling with Rogervoice!

We have completely redesigned the look of your call credit. In order to do so, we have created a new "Credit" tab, which can be accessed from the first screen of the app. It displays an indicator of your remaining credit, all the actions to add credit or change your plan, and access to customer service.
The colors of the app have also been updated to make your experience more consistent.

Making calls between Rogervoice users is free.
No advertisements or selling of personal data.
No complicated registration system required.

• Paid subscriptions
Making calls with non-Rogervoice users requires a subscription. This covers the cost of a Rogervoice number to receive calls, and the cost of calls.
Subscribe to Rogervoice plans to receive and make calls to people who don’t have the app. See our pricing plans on our website or in the app.

Cancel your subscription anytime. The renewal of your Rogervoice subscription is automatic. You can cancel your automatic renewal anytime, at least 24 hours before the end of the current subscription period.

More info:
Website: https://rogervoice.com/
Help: http://help.rogervoice.com/
descriptionShort: Read your calls: Real-time subtitled phone conversations

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Thank you for calling with Rogervoice!

This update brings technical improvements and bug fixes.

title: Rogervoice

creator: Rogervoice
descriptionHtml:
Making phone calls has never been easier if you are deaf or hard of hearing. You can now call your family, friends, doctor and company helplines - in complete independence!

Discover the market's fastest and hugely reliable call transcription application. Rogervoice is the first software for the deaf and hard of hearing that can live subtitle all of your calls at home and abroad in over 80 languages.

- How do you use the application?

It's practical and easy: type in a number or choose one from your contacts. Make a call to whoever you want, whenever you want.

Read speech in real-time: when the person you are talking to speaks, their speech is instantly displayed as text on your screen.

You can reply directly by speaking, or by text. When you write during a call, a voice synthesiser will read your message to the listener.

- NO EMERGENCY CALLS: Rogervoice cannot process emergency calls or calls to premium-rate numbers.

- What are the requirements?

You must have a mobile phone number (sign up is by SMS) and a smartphone with a SIM card. You also need a high-bandwidth connection, whether mobile (3G, 4G) or WiFi.

- Subscriptions, plans and reimbursement

To be able to make calls to people who don't have the Rogervoice application, you must have a Rogervoice subscription which covers the cost of calls.

The plans pricing are shown on our website and in the application.

- Incoming calls

You can also receive calls with our Rogernumber service. To do so, you will need to subscribe and register for a Rogervoice number. The Rogervoice number is free of charge. Share your Rogernumber with all your contacts, friends and family. The Rogervoice app rings when this number is called.

- Who are we?

We at Rogervoice are a team of deaf and hearing experts who are putting all of our expertise and knowledge into phone accessibility.

- The safety of your data:

Our service is GDPR and CPNI compliant: our data and servers are in Europe. We never store the voices and/or transcriptions of your calls. All of our communication connections between the application and our servers are secured.

At Rogervoice, we want to:

- Above all, be personable
- Help deaf people and their loved ones
- Simplify and improve your experiences
- Find solutions
- Have a sense of humour

Our goal? Break down barriers to deafness in everyday life.

To find out more, go to [http://rogervoice.com](http://rogervoice.com/)!
descriptionShort: Read your calls: Real-time subtitled phone conversations

2. Read your calls in real time. During a call, simply hold your smartphone in front of you to read the transcribed text.
3. Reply by talking using your voice, or reply by typing. When you type, your contact will hear your message.

Dial all numbers except short codes or emergency numbers (like 112 or 911).
A separate mobile carrier plan and phone number is required.
For calls, a broadband connection is required either using mobile (3G, 4G) or Wi-Fi network.

Who is Rogervoice for?

• For persons who are deaf or hard of hearing, making a call has never been simpler! No more waiting on others. No more anxiety of missed calls and missed opportunities.

• For persons with difficulty speaking or aphasia, Rogervoice makes it possible to call and type your response in real time.

• For business persons, Rogervoice saves the transcription on your phone, making it easy to record call transcriptions and automatic notes.

Rogervoice is a fully featured phone app. We do the heavy work, so you don’t have to.

• Outgoing calls to any phone number
• Incoming calls from any number
• Free calls between two app users
• Transcription of calls in real time
• Transcription of voice messages
• Text-to-speech of typed messages during a call
• Call log and transcription history
• Saved preferences
• Contact syncing
• Caller ID
• Supports Interactive dial-tone navigation

Is Rogervoice free? Yes.

• Free
Rogervoice is free to download and register.
Making calls between Rogervoice users is free.
No advertisements or selling of personal data.
No complicated registration system required.

• Paid subscriptions
Making calls with non-Rogervoice users requires a subscription. This covers the cost of a Rogervoice number to receive calls, and the cost of calls.
Subscribe to Rogervoice plans to receive and make calls to people who don’t have the app. See our pricing plans on our website or in the app.

Cancel your subscription anytime. The renewal of your Rogervoice subscription is automatic. You can cancel your automatic renewal anytime, at least 24 hours before the end of the current subscription period.

More info:
Website: https://rogervoice.com/
Help: http://help.rogervoice.com/
descriptionShort: Read your calls: Real-time subtitled phone conversations

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Thank you for calling with Rogervoice!

This update brings technical improvements and bug fixes.

title: Rogervoice

creator: Rogervoice
descriptionHtml:
Making phone calls has never been easier if you are deaf or hard of hearing. You can now call your family, friends, doctor and company helplines - in complete independence!

Discover the market's fastest and hugely reliable call transcription application. Rogervoice is the first software for the deaf and hard of hearing that can live subtitle all of your calls at home and abroad in over 80 languages.

- How do you use the application?

It's practical and easy: type in a number or choose one from your contacts. Make a call to whoever you want, whenever you want.

Read speech in real-time: when the person you are talking to speaks, their speech is instantly displayed as text on your screen.

You can reply directly by speaking, or by text. When you write during a call, a voice synthesiser will read your message to the listener.

- NO EMERGENCY CALLS: Rogervoice cannot process emergency calls or calls to premium-rate numbers.

- What are the requirements?

You must have a mobile phone number (sign up is by SMS) and a smartphone with a SIM card. You also need a high-bandwidth connection, whether mobile (3G, 4G) or WiFi.

- Subscriptions, plans and reimbursement

To be able to make calls to people who don't have the Rogervoice application, you must have a Rogervoice subscription which covers the cost of calls.

The plans pricing are shown on our website and in the application.

- Incoming calls

You can also receive calls with our Rogernumber service. To do so, you will need to subscribe and register for a Rogervoice number. The Rogervoice number is free of charge. Share your Rogernumber with all your contacts, friends and family. The Rogervoice app rings when this number is called.

- Who are we?

We at Rogervoice are a team of deaf and hearing experts who are putting all of our expertise and knowledge into phone accessibility.

- The safety of your data:

Our service is GDPR and CPNI compliant: our data and servers are in Europe. We never store the voices and/or transcriptions of your calls. All of our communication connections between the application and our servers are secured.

At Rogervoice, we want to:

- Above all, be personable
- Help deaf people and their loved ones
- Simplify and improve your experiences
- Find solutions
- Have a sense of humour

Our goal? Break down barriers to deafness in everyday life.

To find out more, go to [http://rogervoice.com](http://rogervoice.com/)!
descriptionShort: Read your calls: Real-time subtitled phone conversations

title: Rogervoice

creator: Rogervoice
descriptionHtml:
Rogervoice subtitles phone calls. Call anyone, and get a real-time transcription of the conversation. Meet the fastest, most reliable and versatile call captioning app on the market. And it’s free.

Do you know someone having difficulty with phone calls because of their hearing?
Make their day better and share this app with them.

Rogervoice uses automatic speech recognition and speech synthesis.
Call anyone, anytime. Rogervoice is available 24/7!
Breaking barriers worldwide : Rogervoice works in over 100 languages, in any country.

How does Rogervoice work?

1. Dial any number. Call your friends, your coworkers, your doctor, or any number, local or international.
2. Read your calls in real time. During a call, simply hold your smartphone in front of you to read the transcribed text.
3. Reply by talking using your voice, or reply by typing. When you type, your contact will hear your message.

Dial all numbers except short codes or emergency numbers (like 112 or 911).
A separate mobile carrier plan and phone number is required.
For calls, a broadband connection is required either using mobile (3G, 4G) or Wi-Fi network.

Who is Rogervoice for?

• For persons who are deaf or hard of hearing, making a call has never been simpler! No more waiting on others. No more anxiety of missed calls and missed opportunities.

• For persons with difficulty speaking or aphasia, Rogervoice makes it possible to call and type your response in real time.

• For business persons, Rogervoice saves the transcription on your phone, making it easy to record call transcriptions and automatic notes.

Rogervoice is a fully featured phone app. We do the heavy work, so you don’t have to.

• Outgoing calls to any phone number
• Incoming calls from any number
• Free calls between two app users
• Transcription of calls in real time
• Transcription of voice messages
• Text-to-speech of typed messages during a call
• Call log and transcription history
• Saved preferences
• Contact syncing
• Caller ID
• Supports Interactive dial-tone navigation

Is Rogervoice free? Yes.

• Free
Rogervoice is free to download and register.
Making calls between Rogervoice users is free.
No advertisements or selling of personal data.
No complicated registration system required.

• Paid subscriptions
Making calls with non-Rogervoice users requires a subscription. This covers the cost of a Rogervoice number to receive calls, and the cost of calls.
Subscribe to Rogervoice plans to receive and make calls to people who don’t have the app. See our pricing plans on our website or in the app.

Cancel your subscription anytime. The renewal of your Rogervoice subscription is automatic. You can cancel your automatic renewal anytime, at least 24 hours before the end of the current subscription period.

Help: http://help.rogervoice.com/

Make their day better and share this app with them.

Rogervoice uses automatic speech recognition and speech synthesis.
Call anyone, anytime. Rogervoice is available 24/7!
Breaking barriers worldwide : Rogervoice works in over 100 languages, in any country.

How does Rogervoice work?

1. Dial any number. Call your friends, your coworkers, your doctor, or any number, local or international.
2. Read your calls in real time. During a call, simply hold your smartphone in front of you to read the transcribed text.
3. Reply by talking using your voice, or reply by typing. When you type, your contact will hear your message.

Dial all numbers except short codes or emergency numbers (like 112 or 911).
A separate mobile carrier plan and phone number is required.
For calls, a broadband connection is required either using mobile (3G, 4G) or Wi-Fi network.

Who is Rogervoice for?

• For persons who are deaf or hard of hearing, making a call has never been simpler! No more waiting on others. No more anxiety of missed calls and missed opportunities.

• For persons with difficulty speaking or aphasia, Rogervoice makes it possible to call and type your response in real time.

• For business persons, Rogervoice saves the transcription on your phone, making it easy to record call transcriptions and automatic notes.

Rogervoice is a fully featured phone app. We do the heavy work, so you don’t have to.

• Outgoing calls to any phone number
• Incoming calls from any number
• Free calls between two app users
• Transcription of calls in real time
• Transcription of voice messages
• Text-to-speech of typed messages during a call
• Call log and transcription history
• Saved preferences
• Contact syncing
• Caller ID
• Supports Interactive dial-tone navigation

Is Rogervoice free? Yes.

• Free
Rogervoice is free to download and register.
Making calls between Rogervoice users is free.
No advertisements or selling of personal data.
No complicated registration system required.

• Paid subscriptions
Making calls with non-Rogervoice users requires a subscription. This covers the cost of a Rogervoice number to receive calls, and the cost of calls.
Subscribe to Rogervoice plans to receive and make calls to people who don’t have the app. See our pricing plans on our website or in the app.

Cancel your subscription anytime. The renewal of your Rogervoice subscription is automatic. You can cancel your automatic renewal anytime, at least 24 hours before the end of the current subscription period.

More info:
Website: https://rogervoice.com/
Help: http://help.rogervoice.com/
descriptionShort: Read your calls: Real-time subtitled phone conversations

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Thank you for calling with Rogervoice!

This update brings technical improvements and bug fixes.

title: Rogervoice

creator: Rogervoice
descriptionHtml:
Making phone calls has never been easier if you are deaf or hard of hearing. You can now call your family, friends, doctor and company helplines - in complete independence!

Discover the market's fastest and hugely reliable call transcription application. Rogervoice is the first software for the deaf and hard of hearing that can live subtitle all of your calls at home and abroad in over 80 languages.

- How do you use the application?

It's practical and easy: type in a number or choose one from your contacts. Make a call to whoever you want, whenever you want.

Read speech in real-time: when the person you are talking to speaks, their speech is instantly displayed as text on your screen.

You can reply directly by speaking, or by text. When you write during a call, a voice synthesiser will read your message to the listener.

- NO EMERGENCY CALLS: Rogervoice cannot process emergency calls or calls to premium-rate numbers.

- What are the requirements?

You must have a mobile phone number (sign up is by SMS) and a smartphone with a SIM card. You also need a high-bandwidth connection, whether mobile (3G, 4G) or WiFi.

- Subscriptions, plans and reimbursement

To be able to make calls to people who don't have the Rogervoice application, you must have a Rogervoice subscription which covers the cost of calls.

The plans pricing are shown on our website and in the application.

- Incoming calls

You can also receive calls with our Rogernumber service. To do so, you will need to subscribe and register for a Rogervoice number. The Rogervoice number is free of charge. Share your Rogernumber with all your contacts, friends and family. The Rogervoice app rings when this number is called.

- Who are we?

We at Rogervoice are a team of deaf and hearing experts who are putting all of our expertise and knowledge into phone accessibility.

- The safety of your data:

Our service is GDPR and CPNI compliant: our data and servers are in Europe. We never store the voices and/or transcriptions of your calls. All of our communication connections between the application and our servers are secured.

At Rogervoice, we want to:

- Above all, be personable
- Help deaf people and their loved ones
- Simplify and improve your experiences
- Find solutions
- Have a sense of humour

Our goal? Break down barriers to deafness in everyday life.

To find out more, go to [http://rogervoice.com](http://rogervoice.com/)!
descriptionShort: Read your calls: Real-time subtitled phone conversations

title: Rogervoice

creator: Rogervoice
descriptionHtml:
Making phone calls has never been easier if you are deaf or hard of hearing. You can now call your family, friends, doctor and company helplines - in complete independence!

Discover the market's fastest and hugely reliable call transcription application. Rogervoice is the first software for the deaf and hard of hearing that can live subtitle all of your calls at home and abroad in over 80 languages.

- How do you use the application?

It's practical and easy: type in a number or choose one from your contacts. Make a call to whoever you want, whenever you want.

Read speech in real-time: when the person you are talking to speaks, their speech is instantly displayed as text on your screen.

You can reply directly by speaking, or by text. When you write during a call, a voice synthesiser will read your message to the listener.

- NO EMERGENCY CALLS: Rogervoice cannot process emergency calls or calls to premium-rate numbers.

- What are the requirements?

You must have a mobile phone number (sign up is by SMS) and a smartphone with a SIM card. You also need a high-bandwidth connection, whether mobile (3G, 4G) or WiFi.

- Subscriptions, plans and reimbursement

To be able to make calls to people who don't have the Rogervoice application, you must have a Rogervoice subscription which covers the cost of calls.

The plans pricing are shown on our website and in the application.

- Incoming calls

You can also receive calls with our Rogernumber service. To do so, you will need to subscribe and register for a Rogervoice number. The Rogervoice number is free of charge. Share your Rogernumber with all your contacts, friends and family. The Rogervoice app rings when this number is called.

- Who are we?

We at Rogervoice are a team of deaf and hearing experts who are putting all of our expertise and knowledge into phone accessibility.

- The safety of your data:

Our service is GDPR and CPNI compliant: our data and servers are in Europe. We never store the voices and/or transcriptions of your calls. All of our communication connections between the application and our servers are secured.

At Rogervoice, we want to:

- Above all, be personable
- Help deaf people and their loved ones
- Simplify and improve your experiences
- Find solutions
- Have a sense of humour

Our goal? Break down barriers to deafness in everyday life.

To find out more, go to [http://rogervoice.com](http://rogervoice.com/)!
descriptionShort: Read your calls: Real-time subtitled phone conversations

You can also receive calls with our Rogernumber service. To do so, you will need to subscribe and register for a Rogervoice number. The Rogervoice number is free of charge. Share your Rogernumber with all your contacts, friends and family. The Rogervoice app rings when this number is called.

- Who are we?

We at Rogervoice are a team of deaf and hearing experts who are putting all of our expertise and knowledge into phone accessibility.

- The safety of your data:

Our service is GDPR and CPNI compliant: our data and servers are in Europe. We never store the voices and/or transcriptions of your calls. All of our communication connections between the application and our servers are secured.

At Rogervoice, we want to:

- Above all, be personable
- Help deaf people and their loved ones
- Simplify and improve your experiences
- Find solutions
- Have a sense of humour

Our goal? Break down barriers to deafness in everyday life.

To find out more, go to [http://rogervoice.com](http://rogervoice.com/)!
descriptionShort: Read your calls: Real-time subtitled phone conversations

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Thank you for calling with Rogervoice!

This update brings technical improvements and bug fixes.

title: Rogervoice

creator: Rogervoice
descriptionHtml:
Rogervoice subtitles phone calls. Call anyone, and get a real-time transcription of the conversation. Meet the fastest, most reliable and versatile call captioning app on the market. And it’s free.

Do you know someone having difficulty with phone calls because of their hearing?
Make their day better and share this app with them.

Rogervoice uses automatic speech recognition and speech synthesis.
Call anyone, anytime. Rogervoice is available 24/7!
Breaking barriers worldwide : Rogervoice works in over 100 languages, in any country.

How does Rogervoice work?

1. Dial any number. Call your friends, your coworkers, your doctor, or any number, local or international.
2. Read your calls in real time. During a call, simply hold your smartphone in front of you to read the transcribed text.
3. Reply by talking using your voice, or reply by typing. When you type, your contact will hear your message.

Dial all numbers except short codes or emergency numbers (like 112 or 911).
A separate mobile carrier plan and phone number is required.
For calls, a broadband connection is required either using mobile (3G, 4G) or Wi-Fi network.

Who is Rogervoice for?

• For persons who are deaf or hard of hearing, making a call has never been simpler! No more waiting on others. No more anxiety of missed calls and missed opportunities.

• For persons with difficulty speaking or aphasia, Rogervoice makes it possible to call and type your response in real time.

• For business persons, Rogervoice saves the transcription on your phone, making it easy to record call transcriptions and automatic notes.

Rogervoice is a fully featured phone app. We do the heavy work, so you don’t have to.

• Outgoing calls to any phone number
• Incoming calls from any number
• Free calls between two app users
• Transcription of calls in real time
• Transcription of voice messages
• Vocalization of typed messages during a call
• Call log and transcription history
• Contact syncing
• Supports Interactive dial-tone navigation

Is Rogervoice free? Yes.

• Free
Rogervoice is free to download and register.
Making calls between Rogervoice users is free.
No advertisements or selling of personal data.
No complicated registration system required.

• Paid subscriptions
Making calls with non-Rogervoice users requires a subscription. This covers the cost of a Rogervoice number to receive calls, and the cost of calls.
Subscribe to Rogervoice plans to receive and make calls to people who don’t have the app. See our pricing plans on our website or in the app.

Cancel your subscription anytime. The renewal of your Rogervoice subscription is automatic. You can cancel your automatic renewal anytime, at least 24 hours before the end of the current subscription period.

More info:
Website: https://rogervoice.com/
Help: http://help.rogervoice.com/
descriptionShort: Read your calls: Real-time subtitled phone conversations

title:
Rogervoice
4.29.2

creator: Rogervoice
descriptionHtml:
Rogervoice subtitles phone calls. Call anyone, and get a real-time transcription of the conversation. Meet the fastest, most reliable and versatile call captioning app on the market. And it’s free.

Do you know someone having difficulty with phone calls because of their hearing?
Make their day better and share this app with them.

Rogervoice uses automatic speech recognition and speech synthesis.
Call anyone, anytime. Rogervoice is available 24/7!
Breaking barriers worldwide : Rogervoice works in over 100 languages, in any country.

How does Rogervoice work?

1. Dial any number. Call your friends, your coworkers, your doctor, or any number, local or international.
2. Read your calls in real time. During a call, simply hold your smartphone in front of you to read the transcribed text.
3. Reply by talking using your voice, or reply by typing. When you type, your contact will hear your message.

Dial all numbers except short codes or emergency numbers (like 112 or 911).
A separate mobile carrier plan and phone number is required.
For calls, a broadband connection is required either using mobile (3G, 4G) or Wi-Fi network.

Who is Rogervoice for?

• For persons who are deaf or hard of hearing, making a call has never been simpler! No more waiting on others. No more anxiety of missed calls and missed opportunities.

• For persons with difficulty speaking or aphasia, Rogervoice makes it possible to call and type your response in real time.

• For business persons, Rogervoice saves the transcription on your phone, making it easy to record call transcriptions and automatic notes.

Rogervoice is a fully featured phone app. We do the heavy work, so you don’t have to.

• Outgoing calls to any phone number
• Incoming calls from any number
• Free calls between two app users
• Transcription of calls in real time
• Transcription of voice messages
• Vocalization of typed messages during a call
• Call log and transcription history
• Contact syncing
• Supports Interactive dial-tone navigation

Is Rogervoice free? Yes.

• Free
Rogervoice is free to download and register.
Making calls between Rogervoice users is free.
No advertisements or selling of personal data.
No complicated registration system required.

• Paid subscriptions
Making calls with non-Rogervoice users requires a subscription. This covers the cost of a Rogervoice number to receive calls, and the cost of calls.
Subscribe to Rogervoice plans to receive and make calls to people who don’t have the app. See our pricing plans on our website or in the app.

Cancel your subscription anytime. The renewal of your Rogervoice subscription is automatic. You can cancel your automatic renewal anytime, at least 24 hours before the end of the current subscription period.

More info:
Website: https://rogervoice.com/
Help: http://help.rogervoice.com/

title:
Rogervoice Phone Subtitles
5.5.0

creator: Rogervoice
descriptionHtml:
Discover the fastest and most reliable phone call transcription app. And it’s free, paid for by a federally funded program for deaf and hard of hearing persons. We offer visual voicemail transcriptions, call search history, and customized interfaces for ease of reading.

Own your calls with confidence
Making phone calls has never been easier if you are deaf or hard of hearing. You can now call your family, friends, doctor and company hotlines - confidently and independently!

Keep your number
Just enter your number into the app and we take it from here. No complicated setup. When people call you, the app will automatically pick up the call. When you want to call, just dial a number or select from your contacts.

AI powered and private
Thanks to voice recognition, your calls are private. No third party is involved in your calls. The conversation is only between you and your contact.

Fast, and accurate
When your contact speaks, everything they say is transcribed instantly, word-for-word in real-time, on your app screen. Rogervoice is live captioning at its best. Accessible and on the go from your smartphone!

FCC certified and Free, at no cost to you
We are FCC certified, meaning all eligible US citizens who are deaf or hard of hearing can be qualified to make captioned phone calls on Rogervoice for free. Thanks to the Telephone Relay Service (TRS), a federally funded program.

Two-sided captions
Rogervoice is also free for your hearing friends and family. Simply ask them to download the app and use our app-to-app calling services. They can read a copy of the captions as they speak and be assured that you’re catching what they’re saying.

E911 compatible
We handle your emergency calls with live captions. You have the option to activate automated location services using our telecommunications technology, so that emergency responders can pinpoint your call location, saving precious time and lives. NOTE: e911 is available in the United States ONLY. Use your mobile carrier’s native dialer to make emergency calls outside of the United States.

Viewing comfort
Our app interface is fully customizable to your viewing preferences. Choose among high-contrast modes, dark or light themes, color-sensitive themes, extra-large font … for the best transcription experience, made for you.

Visual Voicemail
Our visual voicemail service allows you to confidently set aside your phone and pick up messages later. No more worrying over every missed call! Simply read the voicemail transcription and decide whether to call back.

Quick Responses
You can use your keyboard to reply, including custom prefilled text. Speech-to-text and text-to-speech: Rogervoice handles all situations, whether you prefer to voice or type your conversation. We offer several voice profiles in both genders.

International calls
Dial overseas numbers, speak in Spanish, Italian, Vietnamese, Turkish … Rogervoice connects you with the world. We transcribe over 100 languages.

100% private and secure
We never store audio and/or transcriptions of your calls. Your call transcripts are localized on your device only. All of our connections between the app and our servers are secure.

Free
Did we mention it’s free? You need to have an existing mobile carrier plan (3G, 4G) or WiFi, and a mobile number. You’ll need to provide your US Social Security Number and address to register with the FCC and you’re set to go.

To find out more about Rogervoice, our story and our services, visit https://rogervoice.com/

Terms of Service : https://rogervoice.com/terms

Help and FAQ : https://help.rogervoice.com

UNITED STATES FEDERAL LAW PROHIBITS ANYONE BUT REGISTERED USERS WITH HEARING LOSS FROM USING INTERNET PROTOCOL (IP) CAPTIONED TELEPHONES WITH THE CAPTIONS TURNED ON. There is a cost for each minute of captions generated, paid from a federally administered fund.
